DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate posture-mobility association upper quadrant mean smartphone measurement
DOC.brief_title: Posture Mobility Measurements Upper Quadrant Asymptomatic Subjects Means Smartphone
DOC.detailed_description: One purpose study measure magnitude thoracic kyphosis , thoracic spine extension , side-to-side difference scapular protraction elbow extension range motion median nerve neurodynamic test smartphone ( iPhone 4 , app Compass , iOS 7.1.1 ) , assess intrarater agreement parameter . Another purpose ass association thoracic kyphosis , thoracic spine extension , scapular protraction rest length pectoralis minor muscle smartphone , photographs tape measurement .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year old Normal mobility joint upper quadrant complaint upper quadrant past 3 month significant deformity upper quadrant leg length discrepancy > 1.5 cm
